name: Media Player Classic Playlist
summary: Learn about .MPCPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Media Player Classic playlists contain references to the media file locations, rather than the media itself.

description: Playlist of media files created with Media Player Classic (MPC), a popular media player for Windows; contains a list of media files that can be played back in sequence or in a random order; may include both video and audio files.
